Title: 3D Book Magic Dinosaur World
Author: সার্কেল এডভার্টাইজিং
Summary:
“Magic World Dino” is an augmented reality based card. This card brings you a new way of seeing 10 different dinosaurs with information in Augmented Reality. These augmented reality books use a combination of text and illustrations to describe dinosaurs in the usual encyclopedia style. However, when a smartphone is held over the illustrations, fully animated versions of each dinosaur appear with information, that can be turned and manipulated by the user. These give you an unforgettable experience to take a picture with dinosaurs and encourage children to engage with their educational content, giving them an interactive experience that’s fun and engaging as well as informational and will always leave a smile on the faces.
Download app from here :
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Circle.Dino

Title: থ্রিডি ম্যাজিক ওয়ার্ল্ড  বাংলা আদর্শলিপি
Author: সার্কেল এডভার্টাইজিং
Summary:
“Magic World Bangla” is an augmented reality based Bengali alphabet book. This book brings you a new way of seeing Bangla letters with different type of animals, birds etc. These augmented reality books use a combination of text and illustrations to describe animals, birds etc. in the usual encyclopedia style. However, when a smartphone is held over the illustrations, fully animated versions of each animal appear, that can be turned and manipulated by the user. These books encourage children to engage with their educational content, giving them an interactive experience that’s fun and engaging as well as informational. This gives your kids an unforgettable experience and will always leave a smile on the faces.


অ্যাপ ডাউনলোড লিংক: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.microtech.neelimarbioscope
